con:testCase.name: GoodCase-RatorServices-PaymentUseCases
con:testCase.con:description:
Tests topups for rator for each supported use-case parameter in request. Tests positive business cases from Rator / PSST evolution services based on documentation in svn: ...src\trunk\SRs\Interfaces\RATOR-PSST\ST_TD_DRC_U-036_PSST_Interface_Specification-V3.2.1.pdf ยง 4.2.2
2019-06-03: Implemented switch for different use cases from rater for ocs and ngocs based on: http://mucsgsvn03.sg.de.pri.o2.com/svn/drcrepo/trunk/SRs/R19-5/SR-78280_NT-Enabler_Integration_of_NGOCS_with_legacy_prepaid_IT_systems_Drop_3/SR78280_U-036_DRC_ASRI.docx Site: 25 Followed test-cases are any more supported with ocs-setting=ngOCS: SMART_BOOKING_NO_SMS_FONIC SMART_BOOKING_NO_SMS_LIDL ALLNET_WO_SMSFLAT_BOOKING_NO_SMS_FONIC ALLNET_WITH_SMSFLAT_BOOKING_NO_SMS_FONIC SMART_S300_BOOKING_NO_SMS_LIDL SMART_S500_BOOKING_NO_SMS_LIDL ALLNET_500_BOOKING_NO_SMS_LIDL ALLNET_1GB_BOOKING_NO_SMS_LIDL SMART_L_BOOKING_NO_SMS_LIDL ALLNET_VOICE_NO_DATA_BOOKING_NO_SMS_FONIC
